Package javelin.model.diplomacy

Class Relationship

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.diplomacy.Relationship
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Relationship
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents the player's relationship to a given Town.
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • describestatus

        public java.lang.String describestatus()
        Returns:
        Description of status.

      • changestatus

        public boolean changestatus​(int delta)
        Parameters:
        delta - Applies bonus or penalty to status.
        Returns:
        true if there was any effective change applied.

      • getstatus

        public int getstatus()
        Returns:
        Current diplomatic status between player and faction, from HOSTILE to ALLY.
        See Also:
        getabsolutestatus()

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • describealignment

        public java.lang.String describealignment()
        Returns:
        A description of Town.alignment, taking showalignment and #showmorals into account.

      • isdiscovered

        public boolean isdiscovered()
        Returns:
        false if Town hasn't been discovered yet. Undiscovered factions are largely ignored by Diplomacy.

      • getabsolutestatus

        public int getabsolutestatus()
        Returns:
        Similar to getstatus() but HOSTILE is 1 and values increment by 1 from there.
